item.description:
Good wealth and evil wealth.

 

We will explore what is financial wealth. Once wealth is defined, then why is it important to create, and continue to create, wealth instead of just accumulating wealth?
Next, we will explore how Capitalism/Objectivism is the best system/philosophy for creating wealth far and above any other philosophies. The concentration of wealth is detrimental to any society; it will not actually survive for long in a Capitalist system and will destroy over time any system/philosophy that promotes the concentration of wealth.

Presenter: Brent.

 

Remember: Even though we post an end time for our meetups, several of us almost always hang around to chat and shoot the breeze after the official event is, um, "over". ALL are welcome to stay for the fun and camaraderie!

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: THE CREATION OF WEALTH VS. THE CONCENTRATION OF WEALTH
